name: I Build It
description: Plans for clever jigs and homemade tools, mostly for your workshop.

name: Lost Art Press
description: An excellent blog, as well as books and videos, all focusing on traditional woodworking techniques.

name: The Stanley Bench Plane Page
description: A useful type study of Stanley planes, as well as a useful dating flowchart.

name: Sharpening Handbook
description: Instructions and diagrams for sharpening pretty much anything.

name: Chime Design and Build
description: Everything you need to know to make a set of wind chimes, including materials, sizing, and tuning; also provides a collection of common tunes.

name: 70birds
description: Free plans for several types of birdhouses and platforms.

name: Patrick's Blood & Gore
description: A beacon of knowledge for Stanley planes. Parts lists, rare models, frequently-missing pieces, and much more.

name: The Barn on White Run
description: Craftsman and woodworker Don Williams' blog. A great variety of projects and studies.

name: Pask Makes
description: Neil Pask's channel. Homemade tools, furniture, and art. Possibly the most patient man on Earth.

name: The Instrument Makers
description: Excellent interviews, shop tours, and information about the making of fine instruments.

name: Hyperkitten Tool Company
description: Vintage and modern wood/metalworking tools at excellent prices.

name: Just Plane Fun
description: Spare parts, mostly for vintage Stanley hand planes.

name: Tools for Working Wood
description: One of those shops where you can't find a bad tool or product.

name: Adrian Preda
description: Furniture, workshop projects, and very nice keepsake boxes.

name: The Woodworker's Archive
description: A large database of various types of plans. A great source for design inspiration.

name: Birdhouse Sizing Chart
description: Dimensions for many common North American species.

name: Epic UpCycling
description: Fine furniture and cabinetry made from reclaimed wood and pallets.
